job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Mada is a startup powering inspired shopping experiences. Our A.I.-based marketplace app, The Mada App, uses proprietary technology to recommend personalized and shoppable outfits for each user. Dubbed “Tinder for Outfits,” the app curates millions of products from thousands of brands and retailers, like Bloomingdale's, Shopbop, Urban Outfitters, and more, to revolutionize the way Gen Z shops. Now, we are working with some of the world’s largest brands on a new venture, and are looking for an uber-talented data scientist to join our team to help us push the boundaries of what’s possible for product recommendation.
Major responsibilities include:
Build and deploy ML models and applications in the cloud
Maintain and improve existing ML models and applications
Diagnosing and resolving bugs and issues promptly
Create ETL pipelines to/from various types of data structures
Research and validate new approaches to ML for use within our apps and interfaces
Interface closely with our product, tech and other teams
Create project plans for and estimate level of effort for ML initiatives
Participate in full group project planning and sales engineering meetings
Automate analytics and business intelligence reporting
Required Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent
3+ years of industry experience in an ML engineer or data scientist role building ML models or hands on experience developing deep learning models
Experience writing Python and SQL
Experience with computer vision
Experience creating ETL pipelines
Experience in deploying models to production environments at scale behind an API
Experience handling very large size datasets (tens of gigabytes)
Ability to break down problems and create solutions in an organized and clear manner
Clear written and verbal communicator to technical and non-technical audiences
Strong business acumen, empathy for customer needs
Experience working remotely, self-motivated
Our ideal superstar:
Impeccable communication and interpersonal skills
Thrives in a fast-paced and constantly changing environment
Expert in creative problem solving
Outgoing, friendly
Extremely organized (Marie Kondo level)
Handles pressure in a cool calm and collected manner
Entrepreneurial, self-starter, independent, doesn’t require hand holding
If this sounds like you, please send your resume and a quick video introducing yourself and explaining why you’d be a great fit for the role to careers@themadaapp.com
